subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Shaquille O’Neal, who does not have a contract yet, said he thought he would play in the N.B.A. next season but would retire if a contending team did not make him an offer.
snippet: Shaquille O’Neal, who does not have a contract yet, said he thought he would play in the N.B.A. next season but would retire if a contending team did not make him an offer.
